com.engine.audio

Class AudioHandler

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.engine.audio.AudioHandler

  • public class AudioHandler
extends java.lang.Object

    AudioHandler

    AudioHandler is the game's audio engine. All sound is processed here.

    Functionality:

    The functionality of AudioHandler is basic. It can currently play sounds of two types, music or SFX.

    Current Features:

    • Play an audio file
    • loop an audio file
    • Stop an audio file:
      Methods:
      • stopSound(): Stops every playing audio clip of the same audio file.
      • stopUniqueSound(): Stops only the playing clip/clips with the given unique name. Used to handle individual sound clips of the same audio file.
    • Pause an audio file: Methods:
      • pauseSound(): Pauses every playing audio clip of the same audio file.
      • pauseUniqueSound(): Pauses only the playing clip/clips with the given unique name. Used to handle individual sound clips of the same audio file.
    • Resume a paused audio file: Methods:
      • resumeSound(): Resumes every playing audio clip of the same audio file.
      • resumeUniqueSound(): Resumes only the playing clip/clips with the given unique name. Used to handle individual sound clips of the same audio file.


    NOTE: Only .WAV files are supported as of v1.2.

    Author:
    Ryan Hochmuth

      MUSIC: Any sound that is generally longer and considered to be musical

      • update

        public void update()
        A general update method called every tick from CoreClock. This update method is used to remove finished sounds from the soundList.

      • stopSound

        public void stopSound(java.lang.String soundPath,
                      int soundType)
        Stop the sound playing at soundPath.
        NOTE: If multiple of the same sounds are playing, they will all be stopped. To stop a specific one, stop it with stopUniqueSound().
        Parameters:
        soundPath -
        soundType -

      • stopUniqueSound

        Parameters:

      • pauseSound

        public void pauseSound(java.lang.String soundPath,
                       int soundType)
        Pause the sound playing at soundPath.
        NOTE: To resume this sound, don't use playSound(), use resumeSound().
        NOTE: If multiple of the same sounds are playing, they will all be paused. To pause a specific one, pause it with pauseUniqueSound().
        Parameters:
        soundPath -
        soundType -

      • setMusicVolume

        public void setMusicVolume(float musicVolume)
        Set the music volume of audio play back. To reduce volume give a negative number (ex. -10.0f). To increase volume give a positive number (ex. 6.0f).
        NOTE: When increasing volume, a maximum of 6.0f can be given.
        Parameters:
        volume -

      • setSfxVolume

        public void setSfxVolume(float sfxVolume)
        Set the sfx volume of audio play back. To reduce volume give a negative number (ex. -10.0f). To increase volume give a positive number (ex. 6.0f).
        NOTE: When increasing volume, a maximum of 6.0f can be given.
        Parameters:
        volume -
